#summary The overflow-y property specifies whether content of a block-level element is clipped vertically when it overflows the element's box.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-microsoft

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *overflow-y*

== Values ==

  * `visible`
  * `hidden`
  * `scroll`
  * `auto`
